Grayscale| | v2.0| New Multi Grid Version| Add many different sized grids to a canvas| Save list of grids| Several new background colour options| Moving cursor on individual grids or whole canvas| Large Grid name and colour option| Grid or Canvas viewer| Added Canvas raster| Added top left co-ordinates for each grid within a canvas| Added repeating save on grid save if nothing selected| Fixed TAB key in grid list| Fixed corner circle scaling for small grids| Added close button on Main Window| v0.51| Added Horizontal Mouse scroll| Added 8 more background palettes| Added Check for Updates xml|
